helpCompetitionRulesPhrase.content: In a competition, you and Ben take turns trying to provide the correct answer. The first one to lose two rounds by answering incorrectly loses.

helpRepeatPhrase.content: Would you like me to repeat that?

helpMissionLowDescriptionPhrase.content: In Path of the Chef your goal is to master the art of cooking sushi! When you are given an ingredient or food, say the right response to prepare it correctly! You currently have # belt.

helpMissionMidDescriptionPhrase.content: In Path of the Sumo your goal is to become big and heavy! When you are given a food to eat, say the right response to eat it correctly! You currently have # belt.

helpMissionHighDescriptionPhrase.content: In Path of the Guru you'll learn the ways of nutritious food! When you are given an ingredient or food, say the right response to prepare it correctly! You currently have # belt.

helpNewWordsPhrase.content: Do you need to hear the correct response to all the words again?

helpGeneralPhrase.content: In Samurai Chef your goal is to earn different belts in three unique paths to become the ultimate samurai chef! You'll also earn cool titles and other awesome rewards along the way!

helpLearnMorePhrase.content: Need more help with this mission?

helpContinuePlayingPhrase.content: Do you want to continue playing?

helpLowMissionStripe0WordBoardKarate.content: To prepare rice, say 'boil!' To cut the fish, say 'slice.' Let's get started!

helpLowMissionStripe0JuiceWarrior.content: To prepare rice, say 'boil!' To cut fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!'

helpLowMissionStripe0SushiSlice.content: To prepare rice, say 'boil!' To cut fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack eggs, say 'crack!'

helpLowMissionStripe0FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'W' sound, like whale, say 'Wham!' If the word starts with the 'H' sound, like hat, say 'Haa!'

helpLowMissionStripe1WordBoardKarate.content: To eat soup, say 'slurp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp.' To sip tea, say 'sip!'

helpLowMissionStripe1JuiceWarrior.content: To eat soup, say 'slurp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp.' To sip tea, say 'sip!' To eat mochi, say 'lick!'

helpLowMissionStripe1SushiSlice.content: To eat soup, say 'slurp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp.' To sip tea, say 'sip!' To eat mochi, say 'lick!'  To eat wasabe peas, say 'crunch!'

helpLowMissionStripe1FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'W' sound, like whale, say 'Wham!' If the word starts with the 'H' sound, like hat, say 'Haa!' If the word starts with 'P', like pepper, say 'Pow!'

helpLowMissionStripe2WordBoardKarate.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!'

helpLowMissionStripe2JuiceWarrior.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!' To squeeze a lemon, say 'squeeze!'

helpLowMissionStripe2SushiSlice.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!' To squeeze a lemon, say 'squeeze!' To sprinkle some sesame seeds, say 'sprinkle'!

helpLowMissionStripe2FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with the 'W' sound, like whale, say 'Wham!' If the word starts with the 'H' sound, like hat, say Haa!' If the word starts the 'P', like pepper, say 'Pow!' If the starts with 'B' like bongo, say 'Bam!'

helpLowMissionStripe3WordBoardKarate.content: If Arthur tosses a broom, say 'leap and sweep'! If he tosses a sponge, say 'scrub a dub dub!'

helpLowMissionStripe3JuiceWarrior.content: If Arthur tosses a broom, say 'leap and sweep'! If he tosses a sponge, say 'scrub a dub dub!' If Arthur shouts hose, say 'spray away'!

helpLowMissionStripe3SushiSlice.content: If Arthur tosses a broom, say 'leap and sweep'! If he tosses a sponge, say 'scrub a dub dub!' If Arthur shouts hose, say 'spray away'! If Arthur shouts towel, say 'swipe and wipe'!

helpLowMissionStripe3FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with the W sound, like whale, say Wham! If the word starts with the H sound, like hat, say Haa! If the word starts the P, like pepper, say Pow! If the starts with B like bongo, say Bam! If the word starts with S like soup, say SLAM!

helpLowMissionStripe4WordBoardKarate.content: If the word on the board starts with the W sound, like whale, say Wham! If the word starts with the H sound, like hat, say Haa! If the word starts the P, like pepper, say Pow! If the starts with B like bongo, say Bam! If the word starts with S like soup, say Slam! If the word starts with A like ant, say 'Ayaa'!

helpLowMissionStripe4JuiceWarrior.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!' To squeeze a lemon, say 'squeeze!' To sprinkle some sesame seeds, say 'sprinkle'! To dash some sauce, say 'dash!'

helpLowMissionStripe4SushiSlice.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!' To squeeze a lemon, say 'squeeze!' To sprinkle some sesame seeds, say 'sprinkle'! To dash some sauce, say 'dash!' To peel shrimp for the sushi, say 'peel!'

helpLowMissionStripe4FoodTaster.content: To boil rice, say 'boil!' To slice the fish, say 'slice.' To roll seaweed, say 'roll!' To crack an egg, say 'crack!' To chop veggies, say 'chop!' To squeeze a lemon, say 'squeeze!' To sprinkle some sesame seeds, say 'sprinkle'! To dash some sauce, say 'dash!' To peel shrimp for the sushi, say 'peel!' To garnish with ginger, say 'garnish!'

helpMidMissionStripe0WordBoardKarate.content: To eat chicken, say 'chomp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp'!

helpMidMissionStripe0JuiceWarrior.content: To eat chicken, say 'chomp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp'! To eat stew, say 'slurp!'

helpMidMissionStripe0SushiSlice.content: To eat chicken, say 'chomp!' To eat sushi, say 'gulp'! To eat stew, say 'slurp!' To eat fried fish, say 'munch!'

helpMidMissionStripe0FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zonk!' If the word starts with the 'F' sound, like foosball, say 'Fuah!'

helpMidMissionStripe1WordBoardKarate.content: If sensei gives you beef or tofu, say 'yum!' but if it's soda, say 'gross!'

helpMidMissionStripe1JuiceWarrior.content: If sensei gives you beef or tofu, say 'yum!' But if it's soda or candy, say 'gross!'

helpMidMissionStripe1SushiSlice.content: If sensei gives you beef, tofu, or milk, say 'yum!' But if it's soda or candy, say 'gross!'

helpMidMissionStripe1FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zonk!' If the word starts with the 'F' sound, like foosball, say 'Fuah!' IF the word starts with 'Woo' sound like wood, say 'woosh!'

helpMidMissionStripe2WordBoardKarate.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'!

helpMidMissionStripe2JuiceWarrior.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'! To bite some beef, say 'bite!'

helpMidMissionStripe2SushiSlice.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'! To bite some beef, say 'bite!' To scarf down a sausage, say 'scarf'

helpMidMissionStripe2FoodTaster.content: If the word starts with Z like zebra, say Zonk! If the word starts with F like finger, say Fuah! If the word starts with W like water, say Woosh! If the word starts with K like kite, say Kapow!

helpMidMissionStripe3WordBoardKarate.content: If Arthur gives you beef, tofu, or milk, say yum! But if it's soda, candy or cookies, say yuck!

helpMidMissionStripe3JuiceWarrior.content: If Arthur gives you beef, tofu, or milk, say yum! But if it's soda, candy or cookies, say yuck! If arthur gives you eggs, say yum!

helpMidMissionStripe3SushiSlice.content: If Arthur gives you beef, tofu, or milk, say yum! But if it's soda, candy or cookies, say yuck! If arthur gives you eggs, say yum! If Arthur shows us a donut, say yuck!

helpMidMissionStripe3FoodTaster.content: If the word starts with the Z sound, like zoo, say Zonk! If the word starts with the F sound, like foosball, say 'Fuah!' If the word starts with 'W' sound like wood, say 'woosh!' f the word starts with a 'K' sound like kite, say Kapow! If the word starts with an S sound like snake, say Snap!

helpMidMissionStripe4WordBoardKarate.content: If the word starts with the 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zonk!' If the word starts with the 'F' sound, like foosball, say 'Fuah!' If the word starts with 'W' sound like wood, say 'woosh!' f the word starts with 'K' like kite, say 'Kapow!' If the word starts with an 'S' sound like snake, say 'Snap!' If the word starts with 'H' like hot, say 'Haaa!'

helpMidMissionStripe4JuiceWarrior.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'! To bite some beef, say 'bite!' To scarf down a sausage, say 'scarf'. To glug down grape juice, say 'glug!'

helpMidMissionStripe4SushiSlice.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'! To bite some beef, say 'bite!' To scarf down a sausage, say 'scarf'. To glug down grape juice, say 'glug!' To eat up an oyster, say 'om nom nom!'

helpMidMissionStripe4FoodTaster.content: To chomp the chicken, say 'chomp!' To gulp up the sushi, say 'gulp'! To slurp up stew, say 'slurp!' To munch on fried fish, say 'munch!' to chew on pork chops, say 'chew'! To bite some beef, say 'bite!' To scarf down a sausage, say 'scarf'. To glug down grape juice, say 'glug!' To eat up an oyster, say 'om nom nom!' To gobble up goat cheese, say 'gobble!'

helpHighMissionStripe0WordBoardKarate.content: To prepare milk, say 'splash a dash'! For carrots, say 'slice and dice'!

helpHighMissionStripe0JuiceWarrior.content: To prepare milk, say 'splash a dash'! For carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To prepare ice, say 'punch and crunch!'

helpHighMissionStripe0SushiSlice.content: To prepare milk, say 'splash a dash'! For carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To prepare ice, say 'punch and crunch!' To not add the chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!'

helpHighMissionStripe0FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zaam!' If the word starts with the 'W' sound, like walk, say 'Whammo!'

helpHighMissionStripe1WordBoardKarate.content: If sensei does a punch, say BLOCK! If sensei does a kick, say DODGE! If sensei tries a sweep, say JUMP!

helpHighMissionStripe1JuiceWarrior.content: If sensei does a punch, say BLOCK! If sensei does a kick, say DODGE! If sensei tries a sweep, say JUMP! If sensei does a bow, you say BOW!

helpHighMissionStripe1SushiSlice.content: If sensei does a punch, say BLOCK! If sensei does a kick, say DODGE! If sensei tries a sweep, say JUMP! If sensei does a bow, you say BOW! If sensei tries to grab you, say 'break!'

helpHighMissionStripe1FoodTaster.content: If the word on the board starts with 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zaam!' If the word starts with the 'W' sound, like walk, say 'Whammo!' If the word starts with 'TH', like thorn, say 'Thwap!'

helpHighMissionStripe2WordBoardKarate.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch! If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' To add mint, say 'a hint of mint!'

helpHighMissionStripe2JuiceWarrior.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch! If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' To add mint, say 'a hint of mint!' To add some honey, say 'Add a tad!'

helpHighMissionStripe2SushiSlice.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch! If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' To add mint, say 'a hint of mint!' To add some honey, say 'Add a tad!' To add some banana, say 'dunk a chunk!'

helpHighMissionStripe2FoodTaster.content: If the word starts with the 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zaam!' If the word starts with the 'W' sound, like walk, say 'Whammo!' If the word starts with the 'TH', like thorn, say 'Thwap!' If the word starts with the 'Y' sound like yak, say 'Yaaa!'

helpHighMissionStripe3WordBoardKarate.content: If Arthur throws a punch, say block to BLOCK! If he tries a kick, say dodge to DODGE! If he tries a sweep, say jump to JUMP! If he bows, say bow to BOW back! If he tries a grab, say break to BREAK his grab! And if he tries a headbutt, say duck to DUCK!

helpHighMissionStripe3JuiceWarrior.content: If Arthur throws a punch, say block to BLOCK! If he tries a kick, say dodge to DODGE! If he tries a sweep, say jump to JUMP! If he bows, say bow to BOW back! If he tries a grab, say break to BREAK his grab! And if he tries a headbutt, say duck to DUCK! If Arthur tries a chop, say block to BLOCK it!

helpHighMissionStripe3SushiSlice.content: If Arthur throws a punch, say block to BLOCK! If he tries a kick, say dodge to DODGE! If he tries a sweep, say jump to JUMP! If he bows, say bow to BOW back! If he tries a grab, say break to BREAK his grab! And if he tries a headbutt, say duck to DUCK! If Arthur tries a chop, say block to BLOCK it! If Arthur does an uppercut, say whoa to LEAN BACK!

helpHighMissionStripe3FoodTaster.content: If the word starts with the 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zaam!' If the word starts with the 'W' sound, like walk, say 'Whammo!' If the word starts with the 'TH', like thorn, say 'Thwap!' If the word starts with the 'Y' sound like yak, say 'Yaaa!' If the word starts with a C sound, like cookie, say 'Crack!'

helpHighMissionStripe4WordBoardKarate.content: If the word starts with the 'Z' sound, like zoo, say 'Zaam!' If the word starts with the 'W' sound, like walk, say 'Whammo!' If the word starts with the 'TH', like thorn, say 'Thwap!' If the word starts with the 'Y' sound like yak, say 'Yaaa!' If the word starts with a C sound, like cookie, say 'Crack!' If the word starts with a B sound, like bark, say 'Bonk!'

helpHighMissionStripe4JuiceWarrior.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch!' If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' to add mint, say 'a hint of mint!' To add some honey, say 'Add a tad!' To add some banana, say 'dunk a chunk!' To add some yam, say '10 grams of yam!'

helpHighMissionStripe4SushiSlice.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch!' If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' to add mint, say 'a hint of mint!' To add some honey, say 'Add a tad!' To add some banana, say 'dunk a chunk!' To add some yam, say '10 grams of yam!' To dump a lump of Watermelon, say 'dump a lump!'

helpHighMissionStripe4FoodTaster.content: To splash some milk, say 'splash a dash'! To slice some carrots, say 'slice and dice'! To crunch up ice, say 'punch and crunch!' If Arthur throws you chopsticks, say 'stop, don't drop!' to add mint, say 'a hint of mint!' To add some honey, say 'Add a tad!' To add some banana, say 'dunk a chunk!' To add some yam, say '10 grams of yam!' To dump a lump of Watermelon, say 'dump a lump!' To squeeze an orange, say 'squeeze with ease!'
